Title: I Am Sam
Actors: Sean Penn, Michelle Pfeiffer, Dakota Fanning, Dianne Wiest
Plot: A mentally handicapped man fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter and in the process teaches his cold-hearted lawyer the value of love and family.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 11 nominations.
Production: New Line Cinema, Bedford Falls Productions, Avery Pix
